definitions.definition: observe and direct the execution of (a task, project, or activity).
examples: the sergeant left to supervise the loading of the trucks
synonyms: micromanage "he had to supervise the loading"

definitions.definition: observe and direct the work of (someone).
examples: nurses were supervised by a consulting psychiatrist

definitions.definition: keep watch over (someone) in the interest of their or others' security.
examples: prisoners were supervised by two officers
synonyms: mind; invigilate "you may need to supervise the patient"
